title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Work on cutting-edge technologies in Google's engineering teams. Requires strong programming skills in Java/Python and data structures knowledge.

title: Research Intern
description: Join Microsoft Research India to work on AI/ML projects with direct impact on Microsoft products. Requires background in machine learning and statistics.

title: Digital Transformation Intern
description: Work with enterprise clients on their digital transformation journey. Learn about industry best practices and implementation strategies.

title: Data Science Intern
description: Apply data science techniques to improve customer experience and operational efficiency. Work with large datasets and recommendation systems.

title: Space Technology Intern
description: Opportunity to work on satellite technology and space research projects. Open to aerospace, electronics, and computer science students.

title: Cloud Infrastructure Intern
description: Learn and implement cloud infrastructure solutions for enterprise clients. Work with AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud platforms.

title: Network Engineering Intern
description: Work on next-generation telecom networks and 5G implementation projects. Requires networking knowledge and programming skills.

title: Research Assistant
description: Join cutting-edge research projects in computer science, AI, or robotics. Opportunity to co-author research papers.

title: Product Management Intern
description: Learn product management in a fast-paced food delivery tech company. Work on features that impact millions of users daily.

title: Defense Technology Intern
description: Contribute to national defense technology projects. Open to electronics, computer science, and mechanical engineering students.
